page.title: 17Biddulph Evening Institute.
page.content: The Evening Instute is based at Biddulph High School in Knypersley.It provides a range of activities in sports,recreation,academic,and vocational training at a variety of levels.These include; Typing Physics French Computer Studies Embroidery Spinning Hairdressing Photography Car maintenance Keep fit Weaving/Knitting Mathematics Sociology Bookkeeping/Accounts Geography Psycology Woodwork Cookery Metalwork Flower arranging Badminton Pre-learner driving Dressmaking Advanced driving German Word processing English Beauty Cake decorating Microcomputers Mr.Roy Oakes is the Institute Director.
